                                ::,  ,::                               ``

https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3104717
Mason Jar Lid Holder by charlesodonnell is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution license.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

# Summary

If you're like us, you have dozens of Mason jar lids and rings floating around. These holders will keep them under control. The set includes a ring holder and a lid holder for both the small and large mouth Mason lids.
